title: Ep 7. - Friday Bangerz Is Back
description:
On today's show, the guys discuss who they would want to play them in a movie about the crew of The Pat McAfee Show, who their favorite movie and TV duos are, a 74 year-old man deciding to stay in his apartment as it was burning down, why a prop technician for The Lion King on Broadway was printing 3D guns backstage, and how they feel about Millennials drastically lowering the divorce rate. They also do a little fact or fiction, answer some listener questions, and the best segment in podcasting history, Friday Bangerz, is back to send you into the weekend. Come have a good time with us.

This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @VivalaZito, @BaileyMcComas, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
